DEMO_802_MSG_010:
̃Great, this vessel looks like it's in near-mint condition.
I don't know what I'd have done had something happened to it.
DEMO_802_MSG_020: ̃There, that'll do the trick... now just hang tight there for a moment, ȁ.
DEMO_802_MSG_100: ̂I had to act fast... I couldn't imagine everyone's reaction to knowing she had passed away... !
DEMO_802_MSG_030:
̂Mmm... nothing like a long, refreshing nap. Don't you think?
ā
DEMO_802_MSG_110:
̂Our cloning technology was still in development. However, in order to avoid mass hysteria, I did the only thing I could...
ā
DEMO_802_MSG_040:
̂I suppose this is the first time you're meeting me in this
new form, so allow me to re-introduce myself...
ā
DEMO_802_MSG_120:
̂I am aware of the level of deception I stooped to...
But it did as I hoped and kept the situation under control.
DEMO_802_MSG_050:
̂My real name is Aroma. I was simply acting on behalf of 
the genius scientist... Dr. Lucia.
DEMO_802_MSG_130:
̂She was such an amazing scientist, and people really 
respected her. Without her, they'd have given up...
ā
DEMO_802_MSG_060:
̂Dr. Lucia, who I was posing as, actually created Mother and was the original planner for the entire migration project.
ā
DEMO_802_MSG_140:
̂If you head into the back room, you'll see why she
was so important to us all.
DEMO_802_MSG_070:
̂I actually was her apprentice. She taught me everything
she could, while we worked side-by-side on that project.
DEMO_802_MSG_080:
̂However, she was quite old. When Mother went rogue and created the Broken World, the stress was too much for her...
ā
DEMO_802_MSG_090:
̂Most of our cryogenically frozen comrades were wiped out as well... we humans were on the verge of extinction.
ā
